name: WitlingoChatGPT
0:
”Alexa, open Witlingo ChatGPT”
”Alexa, launch Witlingo ChatGPT”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: witlingo chat g. p. t.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill lets you learn about Witlingo the company by enabling you ask questions freely. The skill uses a custom ChatGPT trained on content about Witlingo the company along with product and services offered by Witlingo.

Here are some questions you can ask:
- How witlingo can help me if I own a business?
- List of some witlingo clients.
- Can Witlingo help me launch a ChatGPT Bot?
- What are the benefits of digital audio?
- Who is the CEO of witlingo?
- Where can I find Dr. Bouzid's new book?

If you would like your very own Alexa skill that is powered by a custom ChatGPT bot using your own knowledge base, Witlingo can help. To find out, go here: https://witlingo.com/witlingo-chatgpt-pricing/
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
